data.title: Website of Indian Railways Institute of Transport Management (IRITM), Lucknow
meta_keywords: one stop source of government information
data.meta_description: National Portal of India provides a single-window access to information and services that are electronically delivered from all Government Departments, Institutions and Organizations. It has been a popular source of information to a wide range of stakeholders - from citizens, to government, business and Indian Diasporas. It is a gateway to access Indian Government websites at Centre, State and District levels.
data.text:
Indian Railways Institute of Transport Management (IRITM), Lucknow was set up in the year 2003 to train Probationary officers joining the Indian Railway Traffic Service. IRITM also conducts several specialized courses for in-service officers to equip them to deal with the changing business scenario in India and consequent changes in the transport sector.

North Western Railway was formed from two division of railways that is North division and West division. Users can get information about tatkal scheme, reservation procedures, commercial information, dormitory, etc. Details about special tourists trains, holiday packages and rail tour packages are given. Users can access information on PNR status, seat reservation, train schedule, trains between stations, seat availability and status of the...

Get information about the Darjeeling Himalayan Railway provided by the Ministry of Railways. Details on the history, map of DHR route, world heritage status, news and events, etc. are available. Information related to the passenger services such as coaches and locomotives, timetable, fare, and opportunities for tour operators is also provided. Find links related to the special tourist trains, holiday packages, rail tour packages, etc.

Get information about the Railway Recruitment Board Ahmedabad. Users can find details of forms, results, schedules, notifications and selection procedures for various recruitment examinations conducted by the Board. Candidates can also check status of their application online. Tender documents, notice, right to information details, etc. are also available.

Find detailed information about Ministry of Railways. Users can get information about Zonal railways, passengersâ€™ services, parcel services by railways, education and research work by railway ministry, etc. Get related links such as complaint and suggestions, 24x7 customer services, E-ticketing, PNR status, FNR enquiry, etc. Details about Darjeeling Himalayan Railway, National Rail Museum, etc. are also given.

Northern Railway, the Jewel Set in the Crown of Indian Railways, has embarked on the mission to vanquish distances and create its own metaphor of existence. Formally established in the year 1952, it remains the largest zone in terms of route Kilometers, even after the re-organization of the Indian railaways into 16 zones.

Rail Coach Factory (RCF) is a coach manufacturing unit of Indian Railways. RCF has already carved a niche in the industrial scenario of the country at large and Indian Railways, in particular. It has manufactured around 28000 passenger coaches of different types including Self Propelled passenger vehicles which constitute over 50% of the total population of coaches on Indian Railways.

Railway Recruitment Board (RRB), Ajmer functions under the Ministry of Railways, Government of India. It is primarily responsible for recruiting the working and supervisory staff (Group 'C') required for Ajmer, Jaipur, Jodhpur, Bikaner Divisions of North-Western Railway and Kota Division of West-Central Railway.

Users can get information about the hill trains of Indian Railways. Details are provided on hill trains for Shimla, Matheran, Darjeeling and Ooty. Links are provided for accessing data on Kangra Valley and Kalka-Shimla railway. Information about the distance between hill railway stations, altitude and history of commencement of the trains is also available for the users.

Information is provided about the Railway Recruitment Board, Bhopal. Users can find Job vacancy, Results etc. These recruitment boards have been set up based on the policies evolved over a period of time to achieve the Expedite selection process, rationalise the work load on existing RRBs, bring the recruitment agencies nearer to the candidates in the far flung areas and interior sides and meet regional aspirations in the matter of employment...

Railway Recruitment Board, Jammu-Srinagar was established in 1983. It caters primarily to recruitment on all-India basis for group 'C' posts for Firozepur Division of Northern Railway, Diesel Loco Modernisation Works, Patiala and Rail coach Factory, Kapurthala.

Information is provided about the Railway Recruitment Board, Muzaffarpur. Railway Recruitment Board, Muzaffarpur is dedicated to cater the Railway as well as the youth seeking job in the Railway by providing fair opportunity to the desiring candidate honestly.

Information is provided about the Railway Recruitment Board, Ranchi. Railway Recruitment Board, Ranchi conducts various examinations for the Indian Railways every year for Group 'C' Posts for Indian Railways and Recruit persons of merit in a fair and transparent manner.

Find information about relevant provisions of the Railways Act under Railway Claims Tribunal. Details are provided under different sections about provisions such as liability of Railway Administration for death and injury to passengers due to accidents, penalties and offences, responsibilities of Railway administration as carriers, unclaimed consignment, prohibition of undue preference, maximum carrying capacity for wagons and trucks etc.
